title: Kakurete Ichaicha Sharehouse!
alternative_title: かくれてイチャイチャシェアハウス！ ; Kakurete Ityaitya Shared House! ; Kakurete Ichaicha Shared House!
status: かくれてイチャイチャシェアハウス！ ; Kakurete Ityaitya Shared House! ; Kakurete Ichaicha Shared House!
description:
Description :
        This is a story about two yuri couples in a shared house, who secretly flirt with one another without the other couple knowing.
- A cool, cute, simple-minded senpai x An energetic puppy kouhai
- A carefree gal senpai x A she-devil kouhai
Enjoy the sweet and affectionate interractions between these two couples!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: Kakurete Ichacha Shared House!
